roleset.name: foretell or be an omen of a future event

example.name: Transitive, Args 0 & 1
example.text: As for the United States, this will augur low exchange rates for the U.S. dollar.
example.arg: low exchange rates for the U.S. dollar

roleset.note: augur: Frames file for 'augur' based on sentences in Webtext2.5-2. No VN entry.
